Episode 1: A Tale of Three Bears

Sam, Sophie and Sybil are three tiny black bear cubs who have just emerged from their 
den in the Northwoods of Minnesota. But this spectacular wilderness is full of threats 
- wolves and coyotes roam the forest looking for stray cubs, the weather can be 
dangerously unpredictable bringing blizzards and forest fires, and every year some 
of the black bears are killed by humans. Their survival depends entirely on the 
experience of their mother and how well they learn the skills she teaches them.

With the help of bear expert Dr Lynn Rogers, Julia Bradbury explores the woods, 
learning about the lives of the black bears and the particular trials 
facing these three vulnerable little cubs.

Sam, Sophie and Sybil must follow their mother's lead closely if they are 
going to survive in this tough and unforgiving wilderness and make 
it through this critical month.

=========================================================================================

Episode 2: A Lion's Tale

Moja is a five-month-old lion cub living with his single lioness mum, 
Nyota, in Kenya's Masai Mara. It is May, and food is scarce; 
Moja is starving. The rains have arrived, and prey is thin on the ground. 
Without the help and protection of a pride, Moja faces the toughest 
month of his life. Moja's mum, Nyota, is his only hope. 
She must find enough food to keep them both alive and protect 
Moja from the hyenas and lions that surround them. Together, 
they face a fight for life; this is their story.

=========================================================================================

Episode 3: A Monkey's Tale

Gremlin is a nine-week-old baby toque macaque. She was born into a troop 
of 70 monkeys who live amongst spectacular ruined temples in northern Sri Lanka. 
Despite the beautiful location, life is going to be a challenge for this little monkey. 
There are harsh internal politics to negotiate and predators roaming the forest floor. 
But the biggest threat to her survival comes from a rival troop of monkeys known 
as the Slumdogs. They are led by a big male called Bad-Eye and the vicious rivalry 
over territory between the two families threatens to explode at any moment.

One in three macaques do not reach their first birthday, and if spirited little Gremlin 
is going to be one of the lucky ones she will need to learn the lessons of survival fast.

=========================================================================================

Episode 4: An Elephant's Tale

Maya is a newborn elephant calf, just hours old; she is the newest arrival in Samburu National 
Reserve in Kenya. It is the rainy season, food is plentiful and there is something 
of an elephant baby boom!

But Maya and her first-time mum Zadie face many challenges: Firstly, Zadie needs to 
reunite with her herd so she can learn how to look after her newborn baby; then they 
must avoid hungry lions and the guns of poachers. But probably the biggest danger they 
face is the flooded river that flows through the reserve; at some point Maya will 
have to cross it, and hungry crocodiles will be waiting.

If she is to get through her first month, Maya will need the support of her whole 
extended family. Together, they must guide Maya, teach her how to be an elephant and, 
most importantly, keep her safe.

=========================================================================================

Episode 5: A Meerkat's Tale

The story of Swift, a five-week-old meerkat pup who has been born in one of the harshest 
places on Earth - the Kalahari Desert. A drought has hit the region, food is scarce and 
Swift's family are hungry. Their desperation will lead them into danger - across busy roads 
and into the hostile territories of rival meerkats. Worse still, they are not the only 
animals in the desert trying to find a meal; predators are on the hunt from above and 
below and meerkats are definitely on the menu!

The dangers are very real, and in this harshest of years it is estimated that only half 
of the meerkat pups will reach two months old. If Swift is to make it, she will need to 
show plenty of character and hope that fortune is on her side.
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2151670/episodes?season=2" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2151670/episodes?season=2</a>
